issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
* 1st Screen - "My Contacts" , having all contacts in a list,
* 2nd Screen - "Contact Details", when I clicked on any contact then I open it,
* At "Contact Details" screen showing "Back button" on top left corner [which is used to go back to previous screen, this back button is by default showing by iOS ],

*Now I want to go back from "Contact Details" screen to "My Contacts" screen via writing code or event.*

Please suggest me, How can I achieve this functionality.
fields.summary: How to go back from current screen using code

comments.body:
To [~ahutton]
Cc : ahutton@axway.com

Please look in it, I want solution as soon as possible.

Thanks
Avinash
[~avinashj@clavax.us] This ticket was missed because it should I have been filed in the AC project, not AMPCLI. I will move it to AC where it can be reviewed

Your comments sound fairly similar to an existing sample app https://github.com/appcelerator-se/corporate-directory, please review that app to see how to obtain that functionality.

If you need any further guidance please join http://tislack.org/ and post questions there, tickets posted to JIRA should be for bugs and feature improvements
